recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, and cook until garlic turns golden.
Add cooked spaghetti to the skillet and toss well to coat with the oil mixture.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.
Enjoy this classic Italian dish!

recipes.name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak the rice noodles in warm water until softened. Drain and set aside.
In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and sliced chicken. Cook until chicken is cooked through.
Push the chicken to one side of the pan and crack the eggs into the other side.
Scramble the eggs and mix them with the chicken.
Add the drained rice noodles to the pan.
In a small bowl, whisk together fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar.
Pour the sauce mixture over the noodles and stir to combine.
Add bean sprouts and cook for another minute or until heated through.
Garnish with chopped peanuts and green onions.
Serve with lime wedges for squeezing over the noodles.
Enjoy the vibrant flavors of this Thai street food favorite!

recipes.name: Miso Soup
ingredients: 1 sheet of nori (seaweed), cut into small strips
instructions: In a medium saucepan, bring dashi broth to a simmer.
In a small bowl, whisk miso paste with a few tablespoons of the broth until smooth.
Add the miso mixture, tofu, and mushrooms (if using) to the saucepan.
Simmer gently for 5 minutes, but do not boil.
Remove from heat and garnish with sliced green onions and nori strips.
Serve hot and savor the comforting flavors of this traditional Japanese soup!

recipes.name: Guacamole
ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeds removed and finely chopped
instructions: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pits, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Using a fork, mash the avocados to your desired consistency.
Add red onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, and lime juice to the bowl.
If using, add diced tomato.
Season with salt and pepper, and mix well to combine all the ingredients.
Taste and adjust the seasonings if needed.
Serve with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos, burritos, or nachos.
Enjoy this flavorful and creamy Mexican dip!

recipes.name: Hummus
ingredients: Optional: Paprika and olive oil for garnish
instructions: In a food processor, combine chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add salt to taste and blend again to incorporate.
Transfer the hummus to a serving bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with paprika, if desired.
Serve with pita bread, crackers, or fresh vegetables.
Enjoy this popular Middle Eastern dip!

recipes.name: Baba Ganoush
ingredients: Optional: Chopped parsley and olive oil for garnish
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
Pierce the eggplants with a fork in several places.
Place the eggplants on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 40-45 minutes, or until the skin is charred and the flesh is soft.
Remove the eggplants from the oven and let them cool.
Once cooled, peel the skin off the eggplants and discard.
In a food processor, combine the eggplant flesh, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add salt to taste and blend again to incorporate.
Transfer the baba ganoush to a serving bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with chopped parsley, if desired.
Serve with pita bread or as a dip for vegetables.
Enjoy this smoky and flavorful Lebanese dip!

recipes.name: Kabsa
ingredients: Optional: Fried almonds and raisins for garnish
instructions: Rinse the basmati rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Drain and set aside.
In a large pot, heat ghee or vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic. SautÃ© until the onion is translucent.
Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.
Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, Arabic spice mix, ground cumin, ground coriander, ground turmeric, ground cardamom, and the cinnamon stick. Stir well to combine.
Add the rinsed basmati rice to the pot and stir to coat the rice with the spice mixture.
Pour in the chicken broth and season with salt and pepper.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
Remove the pot from heat and let it sit, covered, for 5 minutes.
Fluff the rice with a fork before serving.
Garnish with fried almonds and raisins, if desired.
Enjoy this fragrant and flavorful Saudi Arabian rice dish!

recipes.name: Tabbouleh
ingredients: 2 cups fresh parsley leaves, finely chopped
1/2 cup fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
instructions: Place bulgur wheat in a bowl and pour boiling water over it. Let it sit for 20 minutes, or until the wheat is tender and has absorbed the water.
Drain any excess water from the bulgur wheat.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked bulgur wheat, chopped parsley, chopped mint, diced tomatoes, diced cucumber, and finely chopped red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients in the large bowl.
Toss well to combine and ensure everything is coated in the dressing.
Taste and adjust the seasonings if needed.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour to let the flavors meld together.
Serve as a refreshing salad or as a side dish.
Enjoy this traditional Lebanese herb and grain salad!

recipes.name: Goulash
ingredients: 500g beef stew meat, cut into cubes
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add the chopped onions and minced garlic. SautÃ© until the onions are translucent.
Add the beef cubes and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in the sweet paprika and caraway seeds, ensuring the beef is coated in the spices.
Add the diced bell pepper, diced tomatoes, and diced potatoes. Stir well to combine.
Pour in the beef broth and season with salt and pepper.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours, or until the beef is tender and the flavors have melded together.
Taste and adjust the seasonings if needed.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Enjoy this hearty and comforting Hungarian stew!

recipes.name: Peking Duck
ingredients: Optional: Cucumber and plum sauce for serving
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, rice vinegar, Chinese five-spice powder, and grated ginger.
Remove the giblets from the duck and pat the duck dry with paper towels.
Using a fork, prick the duck skin all over, but be careful not to pierce the meat.
Brush the duck with the sauce mixture, ensuring it is well coated.
Place the duck on a rack in a roasting pan, breast side up.
Roast the duck in the preheated oven for about 2 hours, or until the skin is crispy and browned.
Every 30 minutes, baste the duck with the sauce mixture to enhance the flavor and glaze the skin.
Remove the duck from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
Carve the duck into thin slices, along with the crispy skin.
Serve the sliced duck with Chinese pancakes, green onion strips, cucumber, and plum sauce.
Enjoy this iconic Chinese dish!

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: 500g boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
Optional: Naan or rice for serving
instructions: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and cook until it becomes translucent.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger. SautÃ© for another minute.
Add garam masala, ground cumin, ground coriander, ground turmeric, and chili powder. Stir well to coat the onions and spices.
Add the chicken pieces to the skillet and cook until they are browned on all sides.
Pour in the tomato puree and stir to combine.
Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and tender.
Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer for an additional 5 minutes to heat the cream and meld the flavors together.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro.
Serve hot with naan or rice.
Enjoy this rich and creamy Indian dish!
1. Marinate chicken with spices.
2. Cook chicken in butter.
3. Prepare tomato-based gravy.
4. Add cream and mix well.
